bibl.author: William Sloane Kennedy
bibl.title: William Sloane Kennedy to Walt Whitman, [10 October] 1889
bibl.orgName: The Charles E. Feinberg Collection of the Papers of Walt Whitman, 1839–1919, Library of Congress, Washington, D.C.

body.p: I forgot to tell you that I had a nice visit w. Mrs O'Connor. We walked and talked for an hour in Athenaeum & on Common. I refunded $5. to her & we went down and saw Benj. Tucker & he wd take nothing of course for six copies of the paper on William. Mrs K being away I could not have Mrs O'C out here this time but invited her for another.—Busy times, lots of letters, have a visitor—cousin—coming to see me for a few days. Baxter had an article on you in Herald. I see by it you have the new ed. of L. of G. out, glad of it.
